title: You just had a passionate kiss with you last played Champion.
body:
Describe it.

{{champion:17}}  Well, I guess I am a satanist now, his breath smelled like shrooms tho.

replies.body:
{{champion:82}} : You only need to kiss once fool!

Me: Why didn't i play Lux or any other female....

{{champion:82}} : Baka-a!

Me: * Sigh *
I am now scared after thinking of mord saying that
{{champion:13}} i swear i did not touch his scroll
*obligatory ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) here*

Dawwww Koggles is so cute
https://e621.net/data/60/72/6072c0de1698af1907e8c244f417e242.gif?1302656197

(still, quite deadly)

awwwwwwwee, so cuuuuuuuute
I just wanna smash his sweet little head in <3
yes I do <3333

It was pretty hot.  Like, currently undergoing facial reconstruction, kind of hot.

{{champion:63}}

{{champion:1}} 

I'm going to jail aren't I...
http://i2.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/facebook/000/074/866/Ignore_Me.jpeg

{{champion:102}} 
spicy

{{champion:24}}...

Not sure how I feel about this.  I feel like it would get more intense the longer it goes though.

> [{quoted}](name=Votable Jester,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=Q4yLO3Ee,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2016-08-04T00:21:40.785+0000)
>
> {{champion:24}}...
> 
> Not sure how I feel about this.  I feel like it would get more intense the longer it goes though.

im dying omg

{{champion:254}} Now this is something I wouldn't say no to C:

Last ranked game was with {{champion:72}} though.
He needs a hug more than a kiss, and the latter might just end in me getting my lips bitten off (though I like it when girls have some bite in their kisses)
I would hug Skarner :D

{{champion:20}} we broke up shortly after,
the relation was hitting absolute zero

{{champion:22}} 

kk sign me up
{{champion:53}} Does he even have a mouth?
Draw with lipstick

{{champion:4}} 
I was played like a damn fiddle and lost a bet.
Honestly though, even though I'm straight and a male I wouldn't mind
http://previews.123rf.com/images/shakzu/shakzu1109/shakzu110900003/10471559-Puzzled-man-at-computer-shrugs-shoulders-and-expresses-lack-of-knowledge-Stock-Photo.jpg
He does have a certain something something doesnt he

{{champion:6}} 

nnNNNNNOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO
Literally {{champion:6}}. We were trolling and we had {{champion:103}} adc, and I was {{champion:6}} support. Kill me now before he does.

{{champion:61}} 
I am SO glad I decided to play Orianna in ARAM after spamming Jhin and Garen in normals...

Welp...i'm very dead.

{{champion:14}}

{{item:3026}} 

It's dangerous to these things... Take this with you
But {{item:3026}} doesn't cover my face and we were talking about kisses :P  I'd be better off with this {{item:3151}} to cover my face.

O_o

*checks match history, hoping I didn't play my main*

*sees {{champion:62}} (main)*

 http://27.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_m13luvDrvp1qbw0gqo1_500.gif


I was one match off from {{champion:103}} T__T
Use gender bending powers to fix it
oh god, don't remind me of that pls. I'm still trying to erase that memory with brain bleach :(

What... I mean... It would still be weird... But a little less

What PTSD flash back did I trigger this time

A slightly less tame version of this:

 http://pre13.deviantart.net/a05f/th/pre/i/2011/172/d/0/sunwukong_by_lascalis-d3jkdg8.jpg

but with our Wukong. It's not showing anything bad, but it's saucy enough that I'm concerned that I'd get in trouble for showing it O_o

(as a side note, you would not believe how much genderbent {{champion:35}} pictures I ran across in while looking for this .__.)

Oh I know of my mains pictures, I come across then on my quest for Shaconess daily...

You like?

The word "yandere" crossed my mind a few times. Personally, I'm not a fan of the gender swap concept in general, but you know what they say:

 http://memecrunch.com/meme/2ZQ7D/whatever-floats-your-goat/image.png?w=500&c=1

Guess so, I'm impartial to it, unless it can get me out of a weird situation

*rereads...*

That would make things even more weird, lol
{{champion:55}}  Oh yeah... Give us some privacy...{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
So she can stab you
Worth?
{{champion:245}} It was perfect.  I just wonder how many attempts it took him.

{{champion:103}} 
whatever...
Project {{champion:22}}... A bit cold and mechanical, i suppose?

Good news are its {{champion:40}} 
The bad news are that I lost 2.95$

{{champion:12}} 
First kiss was a bull ;-;
{{champion:31}} Sorry for eating your jaw.
{{champion:61}}  Hard but there was some amazing fore-play that included balls. Not sure where-else i could go with it.

I'll pass {{champion:121}}. 

But it twas {{champion:22}}. SIGN ME UP!
